reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress comfortable, well-made, and appreciate its stretchy, soft cotton material that accommodates growth. The dress receives positive feedback for its flattering design, particularly its square neck that suits all body types, and its versatility in creating different looks. The length receives mixed reviews - while some find it perfect, others mention sizing issues. Regarding sheerness, while the black version isn't see-through, customers note that the pink version is more transparent. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Incredible purchase! Worth every penny and then some!
items.body: I LOVE this dress! I am sooo happy with this purchase! I ordered the periwinkle color for my baby shower and it is the perfect lavender shade, just as I’d hoped for! The fit is perfect, I ordered my normal size small and the stretchy material fit my bump nicely and I will be able to wear again after baby arrives! It is an incredibly flattering dress and I didn’t find it see through as much as the other reviews noted either. I am 5’1” and around 130lbs. The length is perfect for me as well! I tried it on both front ways and backwards due to reading the reviews about bra straps showing. It looks beautiful worn either way but I am opting to wear it front ways, I don’t see the same issue with straps as some other women have but I also am not large chested. The material is buttery and soft and perfect for long day of wear and wanting to be comfortable while pregnant. Definitely worth every penny! Will be ordering more colors!! Read more
items.author: Tyler

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy it
items.body: Noiceee. It’s comfortable and form fitting but you don’t feel any uncomfortable seams anywhere. You can easily dress this up or down, it really just compliments your body. Tons of color choices. VERY THIN, wear the most invisible undies you can. I feel like it’s worth the money (i paid $25). Size down cus this thing can seriously stretch. Read more
items.author: David

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable, warm, and cute!
items.body: I loved this dress, but PLEASE READ MY DISCLAIMER BELOW! I wore it for my birthday brunch this past year and loved how it fit. The length is great for taller girlies, and the color is pretty true to the picture. It's lightweight and not see through at all. An IMPORTANT word of caution: I wore no bra with this. It was the middle of winter so I bit the bullet, but this dress looks AWFUL with sticky boobs -- the fabric is a little too thin to hide them. Because of the square neckline it was also impossible for me to wear a wired bra. YMMV with a strapless bra. It worked fine for me because I have a smaller chest size, but please be warned if you aren't comfortable going braless or have a bigger bust size! Read more
items.author: Yolanda Simpson

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfy and fits well but a bit see-through
items.body: I have this dress in blue and pink but the pink seems slightly more see-through. If you have a bit of a tummy like me then this dress will accentuate that and lines from shape wear will show through so keep this in mind. With that being said this is an ideal dress for pregnancy since it’s soft, comfortable and the quality is lovely. Since it is quite thin I find it to be breathable. I’m 5 ft 3 and the length goes all the way to my ankles. I like these dresses a lot just wish they were a bit less see-through. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing fit! Beautiful dress!
items.body: I love this dress! The material is stretchy and the fit is amazing! It's warm too! In other reviews I saw that ppl had a problem with it being see through....the one I received is not see through. I got the black one but will be buying more different colors. Read more
items.author: Brooke Fuller

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars true to size, good quality
items.body: i’m 5’5 and 145lbs ordered a medium and it fit great and went to my ankles, good quality love this dress! Read more
items.author: Courtney Campbell

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bump friendly!
items.body: Used for maternity pics at 9 months pregnant. No need to size up. Looked great. Read more
items.author: Ariana

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice fit but a couple things I’d change
items.body: I recently purchased this long black dress, and overall, I’m pretty happy with it. The material is soft, comfortable, and has a nice flow to it, which I really like. The fit is also great – it hugs my body in all the right places, and the dress feels flattering. I love how it fits me up top and through the waist, making it easy to wear for various occasions. However, there are a couple of things I wish were different. First, the length is a bit longer than I expected. I would have preferred it to be slightly shorter or more fitted on the legs for a more streamlined look. I feel like it could benefit from a tighter fit around the legs to give it more shape. Secondly, the neckline doesn't stay in place as well as I hoped. It tends to shift a bit, which can be a little annoying. It would be nice if the neckline stayed more secure, especially if you're wearing the dress for an event or for longer periods. Overall, it’s a lovely dress, and I’m still happy with my purchase. It’s comfortable, stylish, and the material is great – just a few minor adjustments would make it even better. Read more
items.author: I’ve held off writing this review so I could really test it out and see how it works. I bought this to use for my son due to his dry scalp! He had an allergic reaction to the original shampoo our pediatrician prescribed, so she recommended this Mustela brand to me. We’ve been using it for about 3 months now and are loving it! It has helped with our toddlers dry scalp & has little to no scaly dry flakes anymore. Definitely recommend to the moms!

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Bodycon Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Bodycon Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Tango, Aegean, Hazelnut, Periwinkle, Jet Black, Caramel, Stone, Bubblegum, Olive-khaki. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs.
